bat.name: bat
bat.description: Careful, it's out for your blood.
bat.editorDescription: Bat enemy. Seeks and kills the player if they are unprotected. Is not pushable, is not walkable, can fly, can move diagonnally.

rat.name: rat
rat.description: A tiny rodent that tries to flee whenever you come close to it.
rat.editorDescription: Rat enemy. Flees from the player if they are unprotected. Is walkable, can move diagonally.

boa.name: boa
boa.description: A nasty snake. It'll eat you.
boa.editorDescription: Boa mob. Chases player and most non-flying mobs.

cat.name: cat
cat.description: It doesn't seem really friendly. Then again, few cats do.
cat.editorDescription: Cat mob. Chases player, mice and rats.

hog.name: hog
hog.description: A pig that isn't quite sure how it ended up here. It doesn't seem to want to move.
hog.editorDescription: Hog mob. Doesn't move unless isFood is present.

pig.name: pig
pig.description: A pig that isn't quite sure how it ended up here. It doesn't seem to want to move.
pig.editorDescription: Hog mob. Doesn't move unless isFood is present.

skull.name: skull
skull.editorDescription: Skull enemy. Doesn't move. Is walkable, but kills the player if they step on it, no matter what.

fire.name: fire
fire.description: Fire. It burns. What did you expect?
fire.editorDescription: Fire tile, burns combustible things as well as mobs.

wall.name: wall
wall.description: A sturdy wall. It is too smooth for you to climb.
wall.editorDescription: Wall obstacle. Blocks the player if they can't fly.

water.name: water
water.description: It's deep and nasty. And you'd rather not get your clothes wet.
water.editorDescription: Wall obstacle. Blocks the player if they can't swim.

lockeddoor.name: lockeddoor
lockeddoor.description: A wooden locked door with a keyhole.
lockeddoor.editorDescription: Door obstacle. Blocks the player if they don't have a key.

log.name: log
log.description: A wooden log. It looks too heavy to carry.
log.editorDescription: Wood log. Is pushable and flammable.

beak.name: beak
beak.description: Imagine stumbling upon a human mouth on the floor in the middle of nowhere. That's how birds must feel when seeing this.

byte.name: byte
byte.description: A random byte of data. It's useless.

cog.name: cog
cog.description: A  tiny copper cog. What could its purpose be?
cog.editorDescription: Cog collectible. Doesn't have a purpose yet.

key.name: key
key.description: A key. You can unlock locked tiles by walking on them while holding it or using the key from your inventory.
key.editorDescription: Key collectible. Can open locked doors and vehicles.

malt.name: malt
malt.description: Fermented grains from an unknown origin. One could make wonderful things with these.

oat.name: oat
oat.description: A strand of oat. You're not exactly sure how it got here, seeing as there is no grass on the ground.

toe.name: toe
toe.description: Why would you pick that up? Gross!

toy.name: toy
toy.description: This kind of looks like a stuffed bear, but you can't seem to shake the impression that it follows your movements with its gaze.
toy.editorDescription: Toy collectible. Distracts seeking enemies if placed closer than the player to them.

match.name: match
match.description: Some would just watch the whole world burn. But not you, you're going to have to be satisfied with just this one match.
match.editorDescription: Match collectible. Can burn burnable tiles.

latch.name: latch
latch.description: A door latch, though it seems to be missing the door part.
latch.editorDescription: Door latch collectible. Locks unlocked doors when placed on them (basically useless).

boat.name: boat
boat.description: A boat. You could use it to cross expanses of water.
boat.editorDescription: Boat vehicle. If the player is in the boat, they can go across water.

car.name: car
car.description: A car. Thankfully it's a manual transmission.
car.editorDescription: Car vehicle. Protects the player from basic enemies.

money.name: money
money.description: A couple of dollar signs? Probably a dismissed feature.

goal.name: goal
goal.description: Reach it and win the level!
goal.editorDescription: Goal tile. Same as winning tile.

win.name: win
win.description: Reach it and win the level!
win.editorDescription: Winning tile. Same as goal tile.
